omopColumns.name: nhs_number
omopColumns.query:
select
		ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
		ae.NHSNumber,
		coalesce(ae.ArrivalDate, ae.CDSActivityDate) as StartDate,
		coalesce(ae.ArrivalTime, '000000') as StartTime,
		coalesce(ae.AEDepartureDate, ae.AEAttendanceConclusionDate) as EndDate,
		coalesce(ae.AEDepartureTime, ae.AEAttendanceConclusionTime, '000000') as EndTime,
		i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation,
		case
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation = '01' then '706245009' --X-ray
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation = '02' then '705983006' --Electrocardiograph
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation = '08' then '706585004' --Microscope (histology)
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation = '10' then '1004163002' --Ultrasound
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation = '11' then '90003000' --Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI)
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation in ('09', '12') then '469499004' --Computerised Tomography (CT)
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation = '19' then '878860002' --Blood culture bottle
		else '' end as device_source_value
	from omop_staging.sus_AE_investigation i
		inner join omop_staging.sus_AE ae
			on i.MessageId = ae.MessageId
	where ae.NHSNumber is not null
	and i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation in ('01', '02', '08', '09', '10', '11', '12', '19')

omopColumns.name: device_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Maps concepts to standard valid concepts in the `device` domain.

omopColumns.name: device_exposure_start_date
omopColumns.query:
select
		ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
		ae.NHSNumber,
		coalesce(ae.ArrivalDate, ae.CDSActivityDate) as StartDate,
		coalesce(ae.ArrivalTime, '000000') as StartTime,
		coalesce(ae.AEDepartureDate, ae.AEAttendanceConclusionDate) as EndDate,
		coalesce(ae.AEDepartureTime, ae.AEAttendanceConclusionTime, '000000') as EndTime,
		i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation,
		case
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation = '01' then '706245009' --X-ray
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation = '02' then '705983006' --Electrocardiograph
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation = '08' then '706585004' --Microscope (histology)
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation = '10' then '1004163002' --Ultrasound
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation = '11' then '90003000' --Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI)
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation in ('09', '12') then '469499004' --Computerised Tomography (CT)
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation = '19' then '878860002' --Blood culture bottle
		else '' end as device_source_value
	from omop_staging.sus_AE_investigation i
		inner join omop_staging.sus_AE ae
			on i.MessageId = ae.MessageId
	where ae.NHSNumber is not null
	and i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation in ('01', '02', '08', '09', '10', '11', '12', '19')

omopColumns.name: device_exposure_start_datetime
omopColumns.operation_description: Combines a date with a time of day.

dataSource.name: StartTime
dataSource.description: The earliest episode start time for the spell, or midnight if none are specified.

omopColumns.query:
select
		ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,
		ae.NHSNumber,
		coalesce(ae.ArrivalDate, ae.CDSActivityDate) as StartDate,
		coalesce(ae.ArrivalTime, '000000') as StartTime,
		coalesce(ae.AEDepartureDate, ae.AEAttendanceConclusionDate) as EndDate,
		coalesce(ae.AEDepartureTime, ae.AEAttendanceConclusionTime, '000000') as EndTime,
		i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation,
		case
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation = '01' then '706245009' --X-ray
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation = '02' then '705983006' --Electrocardiograph
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation = '08' then '706585004' --Microscope (histology)
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation = '10' then '1004163002' --Ultrasound
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation = '11' then '90003000' --Magnetic Resonance Imaging (MRI)
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation in ('09', '12') then '469499004' --Computerised Tomography (CT)
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation = '19' then '878860002' --Blood culture bottle
		else '' end as device_source_value
	from omop_staging.sus_AE_investigation i
		inner join omop_staging.sus_AE ae
			on i.MessageId = ae.MessageId
	where ae.NHSNumber is not null
	and i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation in ('01', '02', '08', '09', '10', '11', '12', '19')

omopColumns.name: device_exposure_end_date

dataSource.name: EndDate
dataSource.description: The latest episode end date for the spell, or the latest activity date if none are specified.

		ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,

			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation = '02' then '705983006' --Electrocardiograph

			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation in ('09', '12') then '469499004' --Computerised Tomography (CT)
			when i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation = '19' then '878860002' --Blood culture bottle

	from omop_staging.sus_AE_investigation i
		inner join omop_staging.sus_AE ae

	where ae.NHSNumber is not null
	and i.AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation in ('01', '02', '08', '09', '10', '11', '12', '19')

omopColumns.name: device_type_concept_id
omopColumns.operation_description: Constant value set to `32818`. `EHR administration record`

omopColumns.name: device_source_value

dataSource.name: device_source_value
dataSource.description: SNOMED equivalent device from AccidentAndEmergencyInvestigation; A broad coding of types of investigation which may be requested to assist with diagnosis as a result of Accident and Emergency Attendances.

select
		ae.GeneratedRecordIdentifier,

omopColumns.name: RecordConnectionIdentifier

dataSource.name: GeneratedRecordIdentifier
dataSource.description: CDS specific identifier that binds multiple CDS messages together.
